resources.string: This is an alternating multiplication and subtracting series: First, multiply by 2 and then subtract 8.
This is a simple multiplication series. Each number is 3 times more than the previous number.
Coffee goes into a cup and .... goes into a bowl.
An actor performs in a play. A .... performs at a concert.
In each segment, the figure on the right and the figure on the left are the same; the figure in between is different
Look carefully at the number of dots. The first segment goes from 5 to 3 to 1. The second segment goes from 1 to 3 to 5.

All four segments use the same figures. In the first segment, the squares are on the outside of the circle and triangle. In the second segment, the squares are below the other two. In the third segment, the squares on are the inside.
Each arrow in this continuing series moves a few degrees in a clockwise direction. Think of these arrows as the big hand on a clock. The first arrow is at noon.
The middle letters are static, so concentrate on the first and third letters. The series involves an alphabetical order with a reversal of the letters.
This series consists of letters in a reverse alphabetical order.
Sorry, you were out of time. You can try the test again now.
You have one minute left. Submit before time ends or you will loose the changes you have made
1. Look at this series:14, 28, 20, 40, 32, 64, ... What number should come next?
2. Look at this series: 2, 6, 18, 54, ... What number should come next?
3. Cup is to coffee as bowl is to:
4. Play is to actor as concert is to:
9. Complete the series: FAG, GAF, HAI, IAH, ..., ...
10. Complete the series: ..., QPO, NML, KJI,..., EDC

This test evaluates your logical skills. You will have 10 minutes to complete it. There are 8 questions with a single correct answer and the last two ones need 2 answers. Each correct answer values 10 points, but if you click the hint button, you will loose 5 points, either your answer will be correct or not. You may need a pen and a piece of paper for this.
Click the button bellow if you are ready
